Smart Suitcase: A high-tech suitcase with built-in sensors and AI capabilities that can detect and alert the owner of any potential security threats, such as lost or stolen luggage, and even track the suitcase's location in real-time. Confidence Score: 0.8

Modular Suitcase: A suitcase with interchangeable modules that can be easily customized to fit different travel needs, such as a separate module for shoes, a laptop compartment, or a built-in charging station. Confidence Score: 0.9

Smart Lock Suitcase: A suitcase with a built-in smart lock that can be controlled and monitored through a mobile app, allowing the owner to secure their luggage and receive notifications when someone tries to tamper with it. Confidence Score: 0.9

Sustainable Suitcase: A suitcase made from eco-friendly materials, such as recycled plastic or sustainably sourced wood, that also features a built-in water filtration system and a solar-powered charging station. Confidence Score: 0.8

Virtual Reality Suitcase: A suitcase that incorporates virtual reality technology, allowing the owner to experience different destinations and environments before they even arrive at their destination, such as a virtual tour of a hotel or a city's landmarks. Confidence Score: 0.9
